title: Root
description: Configuration for an APEX Front-End Boost project

appURL.title: Application URL
appURL.description: This is the URL to your APEX application homepage.

srcFolder.title: Source Folder
srcFolder.description: This is where you do the coding. It should point to a local directory.

distFolder.title: Distributable Folder
distFolder.description: This is where the files will be compiled. It should point to a local directory.

jsConcat.title: JavaScript Concatenation
jsConcat.description: Feature that concatenates all JavaScript files into one.

finalName.title: Concatenated Name
finalName.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

cssConcat.title: CSS Concatenation
cssConcat.description: Feature that concatenates all CSS files into one.

finalName.title: Concatenated Name
finalName.description: This is the name of the concatenated file.

sass.title: Sass
sass.description: Use Sass as the CSS Preprocessor in your project.

includePath.title: Include Path
includePath.description: Include a path to an external Sass folder. Allows to use the `@import` feature from within that folder.

less.title: Less
less.description: Use Less as the CSS Preprocessor in your project.

includePath.title: Include Path
includePath.description: Include a path to an external Less folder. Allows to use the `@import` feature from within that folder.

browsersync.title: Browser
browsersync.description: Additionnal options on the browser behavior when using APEX Front-End Boost.

notify.title: Notify
notify.description: This option makes APEX Front-End Boost alert you when a file is dynamically injected to you browser.

ghostMode.title: Ghost Mode
ghostMode.description: This option makes clicking, scrolling and typing being replicated on all devices.

header.title: Header
header.description: This feature adds an automatic comment block at the top of your CSS and JavaScript files with your project information.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enables the automatic header comment block feature.

apex.title: APEX
apex.description: Determines if the APEX builder should open alongside the application itself.

sqlcl.title: SQLcl
sqlcl.description: Required if you want to publish your files to APEX automatically.

path.title: Path
path.description: Enter the path to SQLcl. If it's been added to PATH (environment variable), it is `sql`. Otherwise enter a full path. Example: `C:\sqlcl\sql`

connectString.title: Database Connect String
connectString.description: Enter your database schema information for SQLcl to log in. Format should follow `user/pass@server:port/sid`

themeroller.title: Themeroller
themeroller.description: This feature will generate a `less` file that you can import into your application theme style. It will add editable variables to theme roller.

files.title: Files.
files.description: Include the list of `scss` or `less` files to be parsed by Theme Roller.
